security: Revealing search parameters (names, identifying data) and file numbers could expose targets of intelligence operations and sources. Listing specific names and file data poses risk. Quote: "SURNAME SUBJECT OF INDEX SEARCH BANNISTER GIVEN NAMES Guy", "ESPINOSA HERNANDEZ, VICTOR DOMINADOR 204-0285147*"
summary: This document consists of index searches and consolidation requests for James Earl Ray, cryptonyms, INS reports, State Department telexes, and individuals including Guy Bannister, Victor Dominado Espinosa-Hernandez, and Ed Butler. It outlines requests for information from various files and record centers.
summary_one_paragraph: The document is comprised of multiple index search and 201 consolidation requests dated between 1968 and 1977, submitted by R.B. Holmes (HM788) of the CI/EXO branch, concerning various subjects including James Earl Ray, cryptonyms (SMABOVE, SMABLE), INS reports related to CHANG, Fang Nang, and individuals such as Guy Bannister, Victor Dominado Espinosa-Hernandez, and Ed Butler. The requests detail specific search instructions to IP/IN, IP/MI, and IP/CFS, as well as directives to various TUBE ROOM locations, with the aim of gathering and consolidating existing records and locator data.
title: Index Search and 201 Consolidation Request
